description:
Sei is a first year student at the middle school section of the Seifuu Private Academy. As he is the son of the Iori Model Shop, he has enjoyed Gundam plastic models since he was young. His knowledge of Gundam and making Gundam models are far beyond an adult`s. However, he is unfamilar when it comes to Gundam plastic model battles, and always gets eliminated in the first round of the championship.
Source: ANN
name: Iori Sei
